Sentencas: Differential thermal expansion is important when two strongly bonded ceramics are subjected to high temperatures, as in solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: Computer simulations of thermal expansion in lanthanum-based perovskites

Sentencas: Free energy minimization (EM) and molecular dynamics (MD) techniques were used to simulate the thermal expansion of the perovskites (La,Ca)CrO3 and (La,Sr) (Co, Fe)O-3 on the atomistic scale.
Titulo: Computer simulations of thermal expansion in lanthanum-based perovskites

Sentencas: This paper explores the use of empirical partial charge interatomic potentials to represent the partially covalent bonding in these materials.
Titulo: Computer simulations of thermal expansion in lanthanum-based perovskites

Sentencas: The EM simulations underpredicted the thermal expansion coefficients (CTEs) by up to 26% due to limitations in the potentials.
Titulo: Computer simulations of thermal expansion in lanthanum-based perovskites

Sentencas: The MD simulations predicted the CTEs to within 17% of experimental data for (La,Ca)CrO3.
Titulo: Computer simulations of thermal expansion in lanthanum-based perovskites

Sentencas: MD predictions of the CTEs for (La,Sr)(Co,Fe)O-3 were significantly lower than the experimental data due to the approximate nature of the Co(4+)and Fe4+
Titulo: Computer simulations of thermal expansion in lanthanum-based perovskites
Computer simulations of thermal expansion in lanthanum-based perovskites

Sentencas: Improvements in these results are possible if more extensive databases become available for refining the potentials and effective charges.
Titulo: Computer simulations of thermal expansion in lanthanum-based perovskites
Computer simulations of thermal expansion in lanthanum-based perovskites
